content.highlights: The new season has finally begun with Liverpool leading the charge. Ekiteke leads the scoring charts with City and Haaland maximizing output.
content.standings: Champagne Khusanova leads with strong start, followed by TheBaleEffect and harsh1327
content.chips: No major chips used in GW1 as managers settle in

content.highlights: Arsenal storm to the top after dominant 5-0 victory over Leeds. Tottenham defeats Man City 2-0. North London teams dominate.
content.standings: FragileHappymeal takes lead with 132 points, followed by Darkness and TheBale Effect at 131 points
content.chips: 5 chips used - new highest scores recorded in Wildcards (59) and Free Hits (66)

content.highlights: Liverpool edges Arsenal out with fantastic freekick by Szoboszlai. North London teams face first defeats of the season.
content.standings: FragileHappymeal maintains lead, Cunha Even Win Bro? climbs rankings
content.chips: Multiple chips used - Wildcard Vision scores peak at 59 by Mortiferi
content.eliminations: LMS eliminates lowest scorer - 19 points was the decisive low
